text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC NC told the RNC they wouldn’t hold the convention because of their and your refusal to conform to safety issues relevant to coronavirus. That’s not what I call “loving” the state. Money and jobs may have been lost. People, not so much.
